message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $175 is a bit steep for me.  I'd be willing to pay $125.  Let's see if we can work something out.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $150. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
